dcterms:creator: Yijun Tian
Chuxu Zhang
Ronald Metoyer
Nitesh V. Chawla
dcterms:description: URI-Graph is a large-scale user-recipe-ingredient graph created to facilitate recipe recommendation research and graph-based food studies. It includes three types of nodes (users, recipes, ingredients) and four types of relations connecting them.
dcterms:title: URI-Graph

dcterms:creator: Diya Li
Mohammed J. Zaki
dcterms:description: Reciptor is a pretrained model for recipe representation learning that provides embeddings for recipes, which can be utilized in various recommendation tasks.
dcterms:title: Reciptor

dcterms:creator: Agricultural Research Service
dcterms:description: The USDA nutritional database provides nutritional information for various food items, which is used to enrich the dataset with nutritional data for recipes.
dcterms:title: USDA nutritional database

dcterms:creator: Steven Haussmann
Oshani Seneviratne
Yu Chen
Yarden Ne’eman
James Codella
Ching-Hua Chen
Deborah L. McGuinness
Mohammed J. Zaki
dcterms:description: FoodKG is a semantics-driven knowledge graph for food recommendation that provides structured information about food items and their relationships.
dcterms:title: FoodKG

dcterms:creator: Javier Marin
Aritro Biswas
Ferda Oﬂi

dcterms:description: Recipe1m+ is a dataset designed for learning cross-modal embeddings for cooking recipes and food images, providing a large collection of recipes paired with images.
dcterms:title: Recipe1m+
